title: High CPU Usage on Auth Service
summary: Auth service CPU spiked to 95% causing increased latency.
suggested_solution: Scale up the auth service replicas or investigate recent deployments for inefficient regex.

title: Database Connection Pool Exhaustion
summary: Application failing to connect to database with 'too many clients' error.
suggested_solution: Check for leaked connections in the application code and increase max_connections in Postgres config.

title: Memory Leak in Payment Processor
summary: Payment processor container OOM killed repeatedly after 4 hours of runtime.
suggested_solution: Profile the heap usage using pprof and look for unclosed buffers or goroutine leaks.
